name: Block Puzzle Gem
description:
Block Puzzle Gem is a new classic strategy jewel game. Designed by exquisite beautiful gems, its jewel blocks can maintain peace of mind while enhancing your visual enjoyment.
It's a jewel board puzzle improving your spatial skills and training your brain. Play Block Puzzle Gem anytime and anywhere to relax to have a healthy life.

Why choose this puzzle?
- 100% free to play jewel tile block game.
- A grid to place a temporarily unwanted block.
- Colorful jewel blocks beauty enjoyment.
- Without any internet/time/location restrictions.
- It's easy to play, suitable for all families.

The beginner's guide.
- Drag jewel blocks to any place you want into the grid.
- Fill in horizontal and vertical rows and clear the gem cube.
- Rotation treasure chest helps you break the high scores.

Tips may help you.
- Remove multiple lines at a time.
- Use the excess grid wisely to create more possibilities.
- Explode the spinning star blocks cleverly.

Relieve stress and enjoy Block Puzzle Gem as long as you like. Or compete with your friends to see who will get the highest score.
